name: RogueDeff
description:
Game created for the mix and jam game jam in 48 hours

You play in randomly generated dungeons as an elf character collecting items and deffending the door to progress

HOW TO PLAY:

-Collect items to get stronger

-Switching the button found near the door will begin a charging sequence where all enemies will go after the door trying to destroy it and the player has to move enemies and prevent them from doing so.

-Rince and repeat. 

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

R_Mouse to grapple to objects

L_Mouse to move enemies

E  to interact
